item.name: Shift_R to Control_L
item.appendix: (+ When you press Shift_R only, send Delete)

item.name: Shift_R to Shift_R
item.appendix: (+ When you press Shift_R only, send Delete)

item.name: Shift_R to Option_R
item.appendix: (+ When you press Shift_R only, send Delete)

item.name: Shift_L to Option_L
item.appendix: (+ When you press Shift_L only, send Forward_Delete)

item.name: Shift_L to Shift_L
item.appendix: (+ When you press Shift_L only, send Forward_Delete)

item.name: Command_L to Command_L
item.appendix: (+ When you press Command_L only, send OptionL_Left)

item.name: Command_R to Command_R
item.appendix: (+ When you press Command_R only, send OptionR_Right)

item.name: Option_L to Option_L
item.appendix: (+ When you press Option_L only, send CommandL_Left)

item.name: Option_R to Option_R
item.appendix: (+ When you press Option_R only, send CommandR_Right)
